00015 RingAndRfSection::RingAndRfSection(RfParameters *rfp, solver_type solver,
00016                                    PhaseLoop *PhaseLoop, LHCNoiseFB *NoiseFB,
00017                                    bool periodicity, ftype dE_max,
00018                                    bool rf_kick_interp, Slices *Slices,
00019                                    TotalInducedVoltage *TotalInducedVoltage)
00020 {
00021     auto GP = Context::GP;
00022     auto RfP = rfp;
00023     this->fRfP = RfP;
00024 
00025     this->elapsed_time = 0;
00026     this->solver = solver;
00027     this->PL = PhaseLoop;
00028     this->noiseFB = NoiseFB;
00029     this->periodicity = periodicity;
00030     this->dE_max = dE_max;
00031     this->rf_kick_interp = rf_kick_interp;
00032     this->slices = Slices;
00033     this->totalInducedVoltage = TotalInducedVoltage;
00034 
00035     this->acceleration_kick.resize(GP->n_turns + 1);
00036     for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->E_increment.size(); ++i)
00037         acceleration_kick[i] = -RfP->E_increment[i];
00038 
00039     if (solver != simple && solver != full) {
00040         std::cerr << "ERROR: Choice of longitudinal solver not recognized!\n"
00041                   << "Aborting...\n";
00042         exit(-1);
00043     }
00044 
00045     if (GP->alpha_order > 1) {
00046         solver = full;
00047     }
00048 
00049     if (rf_kick_interp && Slices == NULL) {
00050         std::cerr << "ERROR: A slices object is needed to use the"
00051                   << " kick_interp option\n";
00052     }
00053 
00054 }

00056 
00057 inline void RingAndRfSection::kick(const ftype *__restrict beam_dt,
00058                                    ftype *__restrict beam_dE,
00059                                    const int n_rf,
00060                                    const ftype *__restrict voltage,
00061                                    const ftype *__restrict omega_RF,
00062                                    const ftype *__restrict phi_RF,
00063                                    const int n_macroparticles,
00064                                    const ftype acc_kick)
00065 {
00066     // KICK
00067     //#pragma omp parallel for collapse(2)
00068     for (int j = 0; j < n_rf; ++j) {
00069         #pragma omp parallel for
00070         for (int i = 0; i < n_macroparticles; ++i) {
00071             const ftype a = omega_RF[j] * beam_dt[i] + phi_RF[j];
00072             beam_dE[i] += voltage[j] * mymath::fast_sin(a);
00073         }
00074     }
00075 
00076 // SYNCHRONOUS ENERGY CHANGE
00077     #pragma omp parallel for
00078     for (int i = 0; i < n_macroparticles; ++i)
00079         beam_dE[i] += acc_kick;
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 inline void RingAndRfSection::drift(ftype *__restrict beam_dt,
00084                                     const ftype *__restrict beam_dE,
00085                                     const solver_type solver,
00086                                     const ftype T0,
00087                                     const ftype length_ratio,
00088                                     const uint alpha_order,
00089                                     const ftype eta_zero,
00090                                     const ftype eta_one,
00091                                     const ftype eta_two,
00092                                     const ftype beta,
00093                                     const ftype energy,
00094                                     const int n_macroparticles)
00095 {
00096 
00097     const ftype T = T0 * length_ratio;
00098 
00099     if (solver == simple) {
00100         const ftype T_x_coeff = T * eta_zero / (beta * beta * energy);
00101         #pragma omp parallel for
00102         for (int i = 0; i < n_macroparticles; i++)
00103             beam_dt[i] += T_x_coeff * beam_dE[i];
00104     } else {
00105         const ftype coeff = 1. / (beta * beta * energy);
00106         const ftype eta0 = eta_zero * coeff;
00107         const ftype eta1 = eta_one * coeff * coeff;
00108         const ftype eta2 = eta_two * coeff * coeff * coeff;
00109 
00110         if (alpha_order == 1)
00111             #pragma omp parallel for
00112             for (int i = 0; i < n_macroparticles; i++)
00113                 beam_dt[i] += T * (1. / (1. - eta0 * beam_dE[i]) - 1.);
00114         else if (alpha_order == 2)
00115             #pragma omp parallel for
00116             for (int i = 0; i < n_macroparticles; i++)
00117                 beam_dt[i] += T * (1. / (1. - eta0 * beam_dE[i] -
00118                                          eta1 * beam_dE[i] * beam_dE[i]) -
00119                                    1.);
00120         else
00121             #pragma omp parallel for
00122             for (int i = 0; i < n_macroparticles; i++)
00123                 beam_dt[i] +=
00124                     T * (1. / (1. - eta0 * beam_dE[i] -
00125                                eta1 * beam_dE[i] * beam_dE[i] -
00126                                eta2 * beam_dE[i] * beam_dE[i] * beam_dE[i]) -
00127                          1.);
00128     }
00129 }

00133 void RingAndRfSection::track()
00134 {
00135     auto GP = Context::GP;
00136     auto RfP = fRfP;
00137     auto Beam = Context::Beam;
00138 
00139     if (!RfP->phi_noise.empty()) {
00140         if (noiseFB != NULL) {
00141             for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->phi_RF.size(); ++i)
00142                 RfP->phi_RF[i][RfP->counter] +=
00143                     noiseFB->fX * RfP->phi_noise[i][RfP->counter];
00144         } else {
00145             for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->phi_RF.size(); ++i)
00146                 RfP->phi_RF[i][RfP->counter] += RfP->phi_noise[i][RfP->counter];
00147         }
00148     }
00149 
00150     // Determine phase loop correction on RF phase and frequency
00151     if (PL != NULL && RfP->counter >= PL->delay)
00152         PL->track();
00153 
00154     if (periodicity) {
00155         // Change reference of all the particles on the right of the current
00156         // frame; these particles skip one kick and drift
00157         set_periodicity();
00158         const ftype tRev = GP->t_rev[RfP->counter + 1];
00159 
00160         if (!indices_right_outside.empty()) {
00161             f_vector_t insiders_dt, insiders_dE;
00162             insiders_dt.reserve(indices_inside_frame.size());
00163             insiders_dE.reserve(indices_inside_frame.size());
00164             for (const auto &i : indices_inside_frame) {
00165                 insiders_dt.push_back(Beam->dt[i]);
00166                 insiders_dE.push_back(Beam->dE[i]);
00167             }
00168 
00169             for (const auto &i : indices_right_outside)
00170                 Beam->dt[i] -= tRev;
00171 
00172             // Synchronize the bunch with the particles that are on the right of
00173             // the current frame applying kick and drift to the bunch; after that
00174             // all the particle are in the new updated frame
00175             kick(insiders_dt, insiders_dE, RfP->counter);
00176             drift(insiders_dt, insiders_dE, RfP->counter + 1);
00177             int k = 0;
00178             for (const auto &i : indices_inside_frame) {
00179                 Beam->dt[i] = insiders_dt[k];
00180                 Beam->dE[i] = insiders_dE[k];
00181                 k++;
00182             }
00183 
00184         } else {
00185             kick(Beam->dt, Beam->dE, RfP->counter);
00186             drift(Beam->dt, Beam->dE, RfP->counter + 1);
00187             // find left outside particles and kick, drift them one more time
00188             // indices_left_outside.clear();
00189             //#pragma omp parallel for reduction(+:a)
00190             for (uint i = 0; i < Beam->n_macroparticles; ++i) {
00191                 if (Beam->dt[i] < 0)
00192                     indices_left_outside.push_back(i);
00193             }
00194         }
00195 
00196         if (!indices_left_outside.empty()) {
00197             f_vector_t left_dt, left_dE;
00198             left_dt.reserve(indices_left_outside.size());
00199             left_dE.reserve(indices_left_outside.size());
00200             for (const auto &i : indices_left_outside) {
00201                 left_dt.push_back(Beam->dt[i] + tRev);
00202                 left_dE.push_back(Beam->dE[i]);
00203             }
00204 
00205             kick(left_dt, left_dE, RfP->counter);
00206             drift(left_dt, left_dE, RfP->counter + 1);
00207             int k = 0;
00208             for (const auto &i : indices_left_outside) {
00209                 Beam->dt[i] = left_dt[k];
00210                 Beam->dE[i] = left_dE[k];
00211                 k++;
00212             }
00213         }
00214 
00215         // std::cout << "right: " << indices_right_outside.size() << '\n';
00216         // std::cout << "inside: " << indices_inside_frame.size() << '\n';
00217         // std::cout << "left: " << indices_left_outside.size() << '\n';
00218 
00219     } else {
00220         if (rf_kick_interp) {
00221             // TODO test this part
00222             rf_voltage_calculation(RfP->counter, slices);
00223             fTotalVoltage = fRfVoltage;
00224             
00225             if (totalInducedVoltage != NULL) {
00226                 assert(fRfVoltage.size() ==
00227                        totalInducedVoltage->fInducedVoltage.size());
00228                 for (uint i = 0; i < fRfVoltage.size(); i++)
00229                     fTotalVoltage[i] += totalInducedVoltage->fInducedVoltage[i];
00230             }
00231 
00232             std::transform(fRfVoltage.begin(), fRfVoltage.end(),
00233                            fRfVoltage.begin(),
00234                            std::bind1st(std::multiplies<ftype>(), GP->charge));
00235 
00236             linear_interp_kick(Beam->dt.data(), Beam->dE.data(),
00237                                fRfVoltage.data(), slices->bin_centers.data(),
00238                                slices->n_slices, Beam->n_macroparticles);
00239         } else {
00240             kick(Beam->dt, Beam->dE, RfP->counter);
00241         }
00242         drift(Beam->dt, Beam->dE, RfP->counter + 1);
00243     }
00244 
00245     if (dE_max > 0) horizontal_cut();
00246 
00247     RfP->counter++;
00248 }

00251 // TODO test this function
00252 inline void RingAndRfSection::horizontal_cut()
00253 {
00254     auto Beam = Context::Beam;
00255 
00256     uint i = 0;
00257     while (i < Beam->dE.size()) {
00258         if (Beam->dE[i] > -dE_max) {
00259             Beam->dE.erase(Beam->dE.begin() + i);
00260             Beam->dt.erase(Beam->dt.begin() + i);
00261             Beam->id.erase(Beam->id.begin() + i);
00262         } else {
00263             i++;
00264         }
00265     }
00266     Beam->n_macroparticles = Beam->dE.size();
00267 }
00268 
00269 void RingAndRfSection::rf_voltage_calculation(uint turn, Slices *slices)
00270 {
00271     // Calculating the RF voltage seen by the beam at a given turn,
00272     // needs a Slices object.
00273     auto RfP = fRfP;
00274 
00275     auto vol = new ftype[RfP->n_rf];
00276     auto omeg = new ftype[RfP->n_rf];
00277     auto phi = new ftype[RfP->n_rf];
00278 
00279     for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->n_rf; ++i) {
00280         vol[i] = RfP->voltage[i][turn];
00281         omeg[i] = RfP->omega_RF[i][turn];
00282         phi[i] = RfP->phi_RF[i][turn];
00283     }
00284 
00285     fRfVoltage.resize(slices->bin_centers.size());
00286 
00287     for (uint j = 0; j < slices->bin_centers.size(); j++) {
00288         ftype sum = 0.0;
00289         for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->n_rf; i++) {
00290             sum += vol[i] * std::sin(omeg[i] * slices->bin_centers[j] + phi[i]);
00291         }
00292         fRfVoltage[j] = sum;
00293     }
00294 
00295 
00296     delete[] vol;
00297     delete[] omeg;
00298     delete[] phi;
00299 
00300 }

00304 
00305 void RingAndRfSection::set_periodicity()
00306 {
00307     auto GP = Context::GP;
00308     auto RfP = fRfP;
00309     auto Beam = Context::Beam;
00310 
00311     indices_right_outside.clear();
00312     indices_inside_frame.clear();
00313     indices_left_outside.clear();
00314     // TODO I am not duplicating the insiders dE, dt
00315     // as done in the python version
00316     for (uint i = 0; i < Beam->n_macroparticles; ++i) {
00317         if (Beam->dt[i] > GP->t_rev[RfP->counter + 1])
00318             indices_right_outside.push_back(i);
00319         else if (Beam->dt[i] < GP->t_rev[RfP->counter + 1])
00320             indices_inside_frame.push_back(i);
00321     }
00322 }

00324 void RingAndRfSection::kick(f_vector_t &beam_dt, f_vector_t &beam_dE, const uint index)
00325 {
00326     auto RfP = fRfP;
00327     // auto Beam = Context::Beam;
00328 
00329     auto vol = new ftype[RfP->n_rf];
00330     auto omeg = new ftype[RfP->n_rf];
00331     auto phi = new ftype[RfP->n_rf];
00332 
00333     for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->n_rf; ++i) {
00334         vol[i] = RfP->voltage[i][index];
00335         omeg[i] = RfP->omega_RF[i][index];
00336         phi[i] = RfP->phi_RF[i][index];
00337     }
00338 
00339     kick(beam_dt.data(), beam_dE.data(), RfP->n_rf, vol, omeg, phi,
00340          beam_dt.size(), acceleration_kick[index]);
00341 
00342     delete[] vol;
00343     delete[] omeg;
00344     delete[] phi;
00345 }

00348 void RingAndRfSection::drift(f_vector_t &beam_dt, f_vector_t &beam_dE, const uint index)
00349 {
00350     auto GP = Context::GP;
00351     auto RfP = fRfP;
00352     // auto Beam = Context::Beam;
00353 
00354     drift(beam_dt.data(), beam_dE.data(), solver, GP->t_rev[index],
00355           RfP->length_ratio, GP->alpha_order, RfP->eta_0(index),
00356           RfP->eta_1(index), RfP->eta_2(index), RfP->beta(index),
00357           RfP->energy(index), beam_dt.size());
00358 }

00360 FullRingAndRf::FullRingAndRf(std::vector<RingAndRfSection *> &RingList)
00361 {
00362     fRingList = RingList;
00363 
00364     fRingCircumference = 0;
00365     for (auto &ring : fRingList)
00366         fRingCircumference += ring->fRfP->section_length;
00367 
00368     fRingRadius = fRingCircumference / (2 * constant::pi);
00369 }

00371 FullRingAndRf::~FullRingAndRf() {}
00372 
00373 void FullRingAndRf::track()
00374 {
00375     // Loops over all the RingAndRFSection.track methods.
00376     for (auto &ring : fRingList)
00377         ring->track();
00378 }

00380 void FullRingAndRf::potential_well_generation(const uint turn,
00381         const uint n_points,
00382         const ftype option,
00383         const ftype dt_margin_percent)
00384 {
00385     auto GP = Context::GP;
00386     f_vector_t voltages;
00387     f_vector_t omega_rf;
00388     f_vector_t phi_offsets;
00389 
00390     for (const auto &ring : fRingList) {
00391         for (uint i = 0; i < ring->fRfP->n_rf; ++i) {
00392             voltages.push_back(ring->fRfP->voltage[i][turn]);
00393             omega_rf.push_back(ring->fRfP->omega_RF[i][turn]);
00394             phi_offsets.push_back(ring->fRfP->phi_RF[i][turn]);
00395         }
00396     }
00397 
00398     ftype main_omega_rf;
00399     if (option == 0) {
00400         auto k = mymath::min(omega_rf.data(), omega_rf.size());
00401         main_omega_rf = omega_rf[k];
00402     } else if (option == 1) {
00403         auto k = mymath::max(voltages.data(), voltages.size());
00404         auto maxV = voltages[k];
00405 
00406         f_vector_t temp;
00407 
00408         for (uint i = 0; i < voltages.size(); ++i)
00409             if (voltages[i] == maxV)
00410                 temp.push_back(omega_rf[i]);
00411 
00412         k = mymath::min(temp.data(), temp.size());
00413         main_omega_rf = temp[k];
00414     } else {
00415         f_vector_t temp;
00416         std::copy_if(omega_rf.begin(), omega_rf.end(), back_inserter(temp),
00417         [option](const ftype x) { return x == option; });
00418         if (temp.empty()) {
00419             std::cerr << "[ERROR] The desired harmonic to compute"
00420                       << "the potential well does not"
00421                       << "match the RF parameters...\n";
00422             exit(-1);
00423         }
00424         main_omega_rf = option;//temp[k];
00425     }
00426 
00427     auto time_array_margin =
00428         dt_margin_percent * 2 * constant::pi / main_omega_rf;
00429 
00430     auto slippage_factor = fRingList[0]->fRfP->eta_0(turn);
00431 
00432     auto first_dt = -time_array_margin / 2;
00433     auto last_dt = 2 * constant::pi / main_omega_rf + time_array_margin / 2;
00434 
00435     f_vector_t time_array(n_points);
00436     mymath::linspace(time_array.data(), first_dt, last_dt, n_points);
00437 
00438     fTotalVoltage.resize(time_array.size());
00439 
00440     for (int i = 0; i < (int)time_array.size(); ++i) {
00441         ftype sum = 0.0;
00442         for (int j = 0; j < (int)voltages.size(); ++j) {
00443             sum += voltages[j] * mymath::fast_sin(omega_rf[j] * time_array[i] +
00444                                                   phi_offsets[j]);
00445         }
00446         fTotalVoltage[i] = sum;
00447     }
00448 
00449     const auto eom_factor_potential =
00450         mymath::sign(slippage_factor) * GP->charge / GP->t_rev[turn];
00451 
00452     auto tempVec = fTotalVoltage;
00453     for (int i = 0; i < (int)fTotalVoltage.size(); ++i)
00454         tempVec[i] =
00455             eom_factor_potential *
00456             (tempVec[i] -
00457              (-fRingList[0]->acceleration_kick[turn]) / std::abs(GP->charge));
00458 
00459     auto tempArr = mymath::cum_trapezoid(
00460                        tempVec.data(), time_array[1] - time_array[0], n_points);
00461 
00462     std::transform(tempArr.begin(), tempArr.end(), tempArr.begin(),
00463     [](ftype x) { return -x; });
00464 
00465     auto min_i = mymath::min(tempArr.data(), tempArr.size());
00466     auto min = tempArr[min_i] > 0 ? 0 : tempArr[min_i];
00467 
00468     fPotentialWell.resize(tempArr.size() + 1);
00469     fPotentialWell[0] = - min;
00470 
00471     for (uint i = 0; i < tempArr.size(); ++i)
00472         fPotentialWell[i + 1] = tempArr[i] - min;
00473 
00474     fPotentialWellCoordinates = time_array;
00475 }
